name: Moon Life [Unfinished]
description:
The game is a command-based Zork-like game.  It is obviously miles from being finished, but is somewhat playable.

Commands : North, south, east, west, help, use, take, press.  

The styling of the game won't fully render unless in Full screen mode. (Access fullscreen mode by clicking the little icon in the bottom right of the game frame.)
